name: On current item's page click 'Size' button, check that dropdown is visible, scroll to first size, click on it and check that size have appeared

steps.name: Close cookie consent banner, if visible
Go to 'Men's Jeans' section and close adverts modal, if appears
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
close modal with adverts, if appears
on 'Men's Jeans' page scroll to second item, click on it, wait for url and close adverts modal, if appears
get url of second item from 'Men's Jeans' page
scroll to second item, move cursor to it and click
close modal with adverts, if appears
check that dropdown of sizes is visible
scroll to first available size option inside dropdown and pick it
